title: Can someone identify the font used in the bupa identity?
content:
Can someone identify the font used in the bupa identity?

Thought it might be omnes but it aint.

[http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/brands/0005/2570/brand.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20111214095039/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/brands/0005/2570/brand.gif "http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/brands/0005/2570/brand.gif")
author: CharmingMan

comments.content:
It look like a customized version of Futura...
